divs: Sighting DetailsI'm in beach whit my girl friend. When I look at sky,I could see the object flying on our heads, carrying through circular movements during one 5 minutes. I and my girl friend we are observing the object flying until it disappeared flying in direction to the sea (horizon). I counted for some people who had not believed and many had said despite I was being crazy. After this day I could live deeply other times well similar events. I am certain of that until today I am visited by these beings. Voc���s case can help enters me in contact. I am thankful since already. Ronaldo Lopes

Summary: I'm in the beach and see in sky that object.
